metadata.title: PJ Harlow Face Mask with drink or eat opening flap. The Grazer Face Mask - Hi
features: Lift the tab & graze away. Funny messages hidden inside: HI
This satin face mask is perfect for limiting dust, environment inhalation, and touching of the nose and mouth.
Our satin and silk blend helps to preserve skin elasticity and moisture balance while keeping skin glowing and healthy.
description: This innovative PJ Harlow original is the future of face masks. NEED A BITE? HOW ABOUT A DRINK? TRY THE NEW GRAZER FACE MASK.

title: Grazer face mask by PJ Harlow.  Be protected and still eat or drink.
